Title(s): The Digby Play of the Conversion of St. Paul
Subjects: mystery plays; Paul, saint, conversion of
_description: The Digby Play of the Conversion of St. Paul — 633 lines generally in rhyme royal stanzas

BodDig133.First Lines:
Rex glorie kyng omnipotentRedemer of þe world by the pouer
                    diuine…
BodDig133.Last Lines:
…Commyttyng yow All to owr lord IhesusTo whoys lawd ye syng
                    Exultet celum laudibus
